LanguageData.SCAfghanHound.label: afghan hound
LanguageData.SCAfghanHound.description: An ancient hound originating from deserts in far-away lands. The majority of sighthounds can trace their linage back to these majestic creatures. Sadly, their intelligence is not as awe-inspiring as their appearance.
LanguageData.SCAfghanHound.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCAfghanHound.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCBorderCollie.label: border collie
LanguageData.SCBorderCollie.description: An energetic dog valued for it's loyalty.
LanguageData.SCBorderCollie.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCBorderCollie.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCBorzoi.label: borzoi
LanguageData.SCBorzoi.description: These large dogs are very similar to greyhounds in personality and ability. They are differentiated most easily by their size and coloring. They are very gentle but independent.
LanguageData.SCBorzoi.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCBorzoi.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCBullmastiff.label: bull mastiff
LanguageData.SCBullmastiff.description: A reliable and courageous companion bred for asset protection by rim planet ranchers. Excellent companion for hunting large game.
LanguageData.SCBullmastiff.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCBullmastiff.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCBullmastiff.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SCBullTerrier.label: bull terrier
LanguageData.SCBullTerrier.description: An energetic dog valued for it's loyalty.
LanguageData.SCBullTerrier.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCBullTerrier.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCCaucasianshepherd.label: caucasian shepherd
LanguageData.SCCaucasianshepherd.description: A massive dog originally bred to hunt bears, this canine makes an intimidating addition to any colony.
LanguageData.SCCaucasianshepherd.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SCChowchow.label: chow chow
LanguageData.SCChowchow.description: An ancient breed known for their fluffy coats and powerful bite. Makes a loyal companion and a formidable foe.
LanguageData.SCChowchow.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCChowchow.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCChowchow.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SCCollie.label: collie
LanguageData.SCCollie.description: The most beautiful dog in the galaxy. A valued pet known for its loyalty and bravery. They grow special attachments to their human counterparts and are commonly found underfoot. Collies were popularized after a particularly special merle named Bleu won Man's Best Friend In the Rim 3 years running.
LanguageData.SCCollie.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCCollie.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCCollie.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SCDoberman.label: doberman
LanguageData.SCDoberman.description: Known to their owners for their kind nature and goofy personalities, they are fiercely protective of their masters and make excellent escorts in dangerous areas.
LanguageData.SCDoberman.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCDoberman.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCDoberman.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SCGoldenRetriever.label: golden retriever
LanguageData.SCGoldenRetriever.description: A beautiful dog valued for its loyalty.
LanguageData.SCGoldenRetriever.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCGoldenRetriever.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCGreyhound.label: greyhound
LanguageData.SCGreyhound.description: These popular sighthounds are widely known for their speed. When they are retired from fieldwork they make surprisingly adept couch potatoes.
LanguageData.SCGreyhound.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCGreyhound.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCMiniatureDachshund.label: miniature dachshund
LanguageData.SCMiniatureDachshund.description: An adorable miniature of the standard Dachshund, these comically shaped dogs were developed to assist in pest control on stately grounds. They quickly dug their place into the hearts of even the most steely and rugged groundskeepers.
LanguageData.SCMiniatureDachshund.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SCOldEnglishSheepdog.label: old english sheepdog
LanguageData.SCOldEnglishSheepdog.description: Makes an excellent complement to a field of pristine, fluffy sheep.
LanguageData.SCPug.label: pug
LanguageData.SCPug.description: A popular breed with royalty, pugs are humorous and family-friendly companions.
LanguageData.SCPug.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCPug.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCSaintbernard.label: saint bernard
LanguageData.SCSaintbernard.description: A large, kind dog common in cold, mountainous areas. Typically used in search and rescue, it's large enough to ride if the going gets rough.
LanguageData.SCSaintbernard.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCSaintbernard.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCSaintbernard.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SCSchnauzer.label: miniature schnauzer
LanguageData.SCSchnauzer.description: A breed typically kept for hunting small rodents. Small dog with a big bite. Not recommended for small children.
LanguageData.SCSchnauzer.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCSchnauzer.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCStandardPoodle.label: standard poodle
LanguageData.SCStandardPoodle.description: Many believe this dog is all glamor no guts, but standard poodles are one of the most intelligent dogs in the galaxy. Highly trainable and make suitable alert dogs.
LanguageData.SCStandardPoodle.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCStandardPoodle.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.SCWelshCorgi.label: welsh corgi
LanguageData.SCWelshCorgi.description:
Known for being the favorite breed of the oldest queen on record, the Welsh Corgi makes a spunky, independent companion with an affinity for finding trouble.
In memory of Nugget - the sweetest, orneriest, candy-thievingest dog to ever trot the galaxy.
LanguageData.SCWelshCorgi.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.SCWelshCorgi.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
